events.message: Customer reported filing a claim due to a car collision that occurred on the highway yesterday afternoon.
The claim has been categorized under auto accident after reviewing the initial report and related keywords.
An agent with experience in auto accident claims has been assigned to assist the customer with their vehicle damage case.
The claim for the vehicle accident has been officially acknowledged and a confirmation email was sent to the claimant.
Requested the customer to submit photos of the damaged car parts, police reports, and insurance policy documents.
Customer provided all requested documents including detailed photographs, the official police report, and proof of insurance.
Investigation into the circumstances of the auto accident has begun, focusing on liability and damage assessment.
The investigation concluded that the customer was not at fault and documented the extent of damage to the vehicle.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on repair estimates and coverage terms in the insurance policy.
The customer responded positively to the settlement proposal and expressed gratitude for quick handling of the claim.
The insurance claim has been approved by management after review and agreement on settlement terms.
Payment covering the approved settlement amount was successfully issued to the customerâ€™s bank account.
The claim has been officially closed following confirmation of payment and customer satisfaction.
